# Key Logs (Individual Keys)

Let's read the keylog data into R again. 

```{r}
kl <- read_csv("../data/keylog.csv")
kl$key[is.na(kl$key)] <- " "
kl <- filter(kl, !is.na(gap1), !is.na(gap2))
kl
```

## Multiple Means

Run the following code to get a plot that shows the 

```{r}
kl |>
  filter(gap2 < 1000) |>
  group_by(id) |>
  summarize(
    mu = mean(gap2),
    s2 = var(gap2),
    n = n(),
    l = mu - qt(1 - 0.05/2, df = n - 1) * sqrt(s2 / n),
    u = mu + qt(1 - 0.05/2, df = n - 1) * sqrt(s2 / n)
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(mu)) |>
  mutate(id = fct_inorder(id)) |>
  ggplot(aes(id, mu)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_errorbar(aes(
      xmin = id,
      xmax = id,
      ymin = l,
      ymax = u
    ))
```
